column5: i have like 15 olde williams with no side hooks or rusty bent ones any one know were you buy them? for the 3 inch....
Tromblys tackle in orillia had a bunch the last time i was in there.

I've even seen them at CTC but if you want to be sure, order them from www.luremaking.com and you'll have them in a few days at a good price.  They're $4.99 for 50...sizes 2,4 and 6 here. http://http://www.luremakin...ks/274_hook.htm
I think I still have one or two stuck in jackets and wool gloves.
you wouldnt know what size i need for a 3 inch williams would you? thanks for the link  verry helpfull for this and other things  .  .appreciate it
I would think that 6's would be the correct size but Steve or Helene really know their stuff there.
Fishing Depot had some as of last week , Don't remember the sizes though !
I always take them off and throw 'em away, hate the damn things.
thx for all the info  i found out that #6 is 3/4" long thats the one i am looking for thanks ..
